title: Wallet Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully authenticate using an EVM wallet (e.g., MetaMask) and Solana wallet without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Select wallet authentication and connect a supported EVM wallet.
Check that the user is successfully authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.
Log out and repeat authentication with a Solana wallet.
User is authenticated and redirected without errors.

title: Email Authentication with Valid and Invalid Credentials
description: Validate email login flow accepts valid credentials and rejects invalid ones with appropriate messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter a registered email and correct password and submit.
User should be logged in and redirected to dashboard.
Log out, enter a valid email with an incorrect password and submit.
An error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.
Try logging in with an unregistered email.
An appropriate error or sign-up suggestion is shown.

title: Social OAuth Authentication (Twitter/X, Discord, Telegram)
description: Test OAuth login flows for Twitter/X, Discord, and Telegram, verifying secure redirection, token exchange, and user authentication.

steps.description: From login page, choose social OAuth login for Twitter/X.
Complete OAuth authorization and ensure redirection back to the platform.
User is authenticated and profile data is available.
Log out and repeat for Discord and Telegram OAuth flows.
Authentication and profile fetching succeed for each.

title: Project Registration and Quest Creation with Multiple Task Types
description: Verify that project owners can register a project, create quests, and assign multi-step tasks of all supported types correctly.

steps.description: Log in as a project owner.
Navigate to project registration page and complete registration.
Project is created successfully and visible in the project dashboard.
Create a new quest with multiple steps including social tasks (follow, join), download tasks, form submission, visit links, and learn/quiz.
Each task type accepts input as expected and can be saved.
Publish the quest and confirm visibility to users.
Quest appears in the project quests list and user-facing quest browsers.

title: User Quest Participation and Completion Flow
description: Validate the full user journey for joining a project, embarking on a multi-step quest, completing all task types, and receiving XP.

steps.description: Log in as a regular user.
Browse projects and join a selected project.
User is joined successfully and quests are visible.
Select a multi-step quest and start completing tasks.
Complete each task using respective verification methods, including social API verification for follows, likes, joins.
Tasks are validated in real time and user is allowed to proceed.
Finish all tasks and submit quest completion.
User receives the correct amount of XP and quest status updates to completed.

title: Real-Time Social Task Verification via Twitter/X API
description: Verify that social tasks involving Twitter/X such as follow, like, retweet, and subscribe are validated correctly by real-time API checks.

steps.description: Log in as user connected via Twitter OAuth.
Attempt to complete a quest task requiring follow, like, retweet, or subscribe on Twitter/X.
The system queries the Twitter/X API and validates the user action correctly.
Attempt to complete task without performing the required social action.
Verification fails and user is informed that the task is incomplete.

title: Real-Time Discord Task Verification
description: Validate real-time verification of Discord social tasks like join server using Discord API and OAuth linkage.

steps.description: Log in and link Discord account.
Complete a quest task that requires joining a specific Discord server.
Discord API confirms server membership and task is marked complete.
Simulate leaving the server and attempting to reverify.
Verification fails appropriately.

title: Real-Time Telegram Task Verification
description: Test automatic verification of Telegram join and subscribe actions for quests.

steps.description: Log in and link Telegram account.
Complete quest task requiring joining a Telegram channel or group.
Telegram API confirms membership and task is validated.
Attempt to fake task completion without joining.
Verification fails and user cannot proceed.

title: XP Calculation and Leaderboard Update
description: Ensure XP is correctly accumulated after quest completion and leaderboard updates reflect user ranking globally and per quest.

steps.description: Complete quests with varying XP rewards.
Verify XP totals update correctly on user profile.
Navigate to global leaderboard and quest-specific leaderboard.
User ranking is displayed correctly according to XP.

title: Responsive and Accessible UI Verification
description: Test that all main UI pages (login, dashboard, project pages, quest pages) render correctly and meet accessibility standards on devices of various sizes.

steps.description: Open UI pages on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Layouts adapt correctly with no horizontal scrolling or broken elements.
Run accessibility audit tools (e.g., axe) on key pages.
No critical accessibility violations are found.

title: User Dashboard and Profile Management Functionality
description: Verify users can view active and completed quests, badges, achievements on dashboard and edit profile details including linking/unlinking social accounts and wallets.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the user dashboard.
Active and completed quests are accurately displayed.
Navigate to profile settings and edit user information.
Link a new social OAuth account and unlink an existing wallet.
Changes are saved correctly and reflected immediately.

title: Security Test: Encrypted Tokens and Role-Level Security Enforcement
description: Verify that the authentication tokens are encrypted and Role-Level Security (RLS) policies restrict database access appropriately for different user roles.

steps.description: Authenticate as a user and inspect tokens for encryption.
Tokens are encrypted and cannot be tampered with.
Attempt to access database resources or APIs unauthorized for current role.
Access is denied in accordance with RLS policies.

title: Error Handling for Invalid OAuth Callback or Token
description: Test the system's behavior when OAuth callbacks return errors or invalid tokens during social authentication flows.

steps.description: Simulate OAuth callback with missing or invalid token.
User receives a clear error message and is not authenticated.
Simulate network error during OAuth flow.
Proper error handling occurs with informative feedback to the user.

title: Validation Using Zod Schemas for User Input and API Requests
description: Ensure that all user inputs and API request payloads conform to defined Zod schemas and invalid data is rejected with appropriate errors.

steps.description: Submit invalid data in project registration form (e.g., missing required fields, incorrect types).
Validation errors are displayed preventing form submission.
Send malformed API requests to authentication and quest creation endpoints.
API rejects requests with descriptive error responses.

title: Privacy Policy and Terms Accessibility
description: Verify that privacy policy and terms of service are integrated into the platform and accessible from key pages.

steps.description: Navigate to footer or help sections on multiple pages.
Privacy policy and terms are visible and open correctly.
Check that privacy-related checkboxes or acceptance flows appear during registration or login.
User can access and acknowledge policies.

title: API Endpoint Security and Response Validation
description: Validate all API endpoints for authentication, project management, quest management, and verification respond correctly and securely to authorized and unauthorized requests.

steps.description: Send authorized requests to API endpoints and verify successful operation.
API returns expected data with correct HTTP status codes.
Send unauthorized requests or requests with invalid tokens.
API returns proper 401/403 responses without data leakage.

title: Unit and Integration Tests Execution Validation
description: Confirm that all unit and integration tests for React components and backend logic run successfully using Jest and React Testing Library.

steps.description: Run full test suite with Jest.
All tests pass without failures.
Review coverage reports to ensure key components like authentication, quest creation, social verification are covered.
Coverage meets or exceeds quality standards.

title: Concurrent Quest Participation and XP Awarding
description: Test multiple users completing the same quest simultaneously to ensure XP awarding and leaderboard updates occur correctly without race conditions.

steps.description: Simulate multiple distinct users completing the same quest at the same time.
Each user receives correct XP and leaderboard ranks reflect simultaneous updates without errors.

title: Handling Network Failures During Task Verification
description: Check that the system handles network failures when calling social APIs gracefully, providing retry options or error messages.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or API timeout during social task verification.
User is notified of verification failure with instructions or automatic retry attempts.

title: Linking and Unlinking Multiple Social and Wallet Accounts
description: Verify that users can link multiple social OAuth accounts and wallets to their profile and can unlink them safely without losing mandatory access.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to profile settings.
Link additional social accounts (Twitter, Discord, Telegram) and wallets.
New links are reflected in the profile.
Unlink a social account and confirm no impact on required authentication.
User can still log in using remaining methods.
